Title: Credit Suisse Asset Management winds down its supply chain finance funds and commences first payment
Subtitle: In order to protect the interests of all investors in the Credit Suisse supply chain finance funds, Credit Suisse Asset Management fund boards suspended the redemptions and subscriptions in the funds with effect as of 1 March 2021. Credit Suisse Asset Management’s priority is to ensure a balance between a timely liquidation of the funds and maximizing value for the investors.
